post:
Infinite Technologies (www.InfiniteTech.in) is a leader in providing businesses with innovative technical solutions. Our exceptional services are equaled only by our continued focus on outstanding quality and support; our friendly staff is available 24/7 to assist you with any matters that may arise. Our servers are housed in the Databurg data-center located in Frankfurt, Germany.

Your VPS includes the following value added services:
• Fully Managed Technical Support Service* (best effort basis)
• 1 GB remote FTP space available on-demand*
• Virtuozzo for VPS Administration (reboot, reinstall, etc)
• Reverse DNS entries for allocated IPs
• GUI Firewall Configuration Wizard (block IPs even during attacks with ease)
• Choice of OS (CentOS, Debian, Fedora Core, SuSE, Windows 2003)
• Control Panel Choices: cPanel, Plesk, DirectAdmin or Webmin
• No longterm contract (month to month)
